```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Install necessary packages if not already installed
install.packages(c("forecast", "ggplot2"))

# Load the packages
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
# Set seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)

# Number of observations
n <- 100

# Define parameters for each model
# You can adjust these parameters as needed
# ARMA(1,1) parameters
phi <- 0.5   # AR(1) coefficient
theta <- 0.5 # MA(1) coefficient

# ARMA(1,0) parameters (AR(1))
phi_ar <- 0.5

# ARMA(0,1) parameters (MA(1))
theta_ma <- 0.5

# Generate ARMA(1,1) series
arma11_series <- arima.sim(n = n, 
                           list(ar = .5, ma = .5), 
                           sd = 1)
arma10_series <- arima.sim(n = n, 
                           list(ar = phi_ar), 
                           sd = 1)

arma01_series <- arima.sim(n = n, 
                           list(ma = theta_ma), 
                           sd = 1)
# Plot the series
ts.plot(arma11_series, main = "ARMA(1,1) Time Series", ylab = "Value")
ts.plot(arma10_series, main = "AR(1) Time Series", ylab = "Value")
ts.plot(arma01_series, main = "MA(1) Time Series", ylab = "Value")


```

```{r}

# Sample ACF
acf_arma11 <- Acf(arma11_series, main = "Sample ACF of ARMA(1,1)")
pacf_arma11 <- Pacf(arma11_series, main = "Sample PACF of ARMA(1,1)")

theoretical_acf_arma11 <- ARMAacf(ar = phi, ma = theta, lag.max = 20)

# Plot Sample ACF and Theoretical ACF
plot(acf_arma11, main = "Sample ACF vs Theoretical ACF for ARMA(1,1)")
lines(0:20, theoretical_acf_arma11, col = "red", lty = 2)
legend("topright", legend = c("Sample ACF", "Theoretical ACF"), 
       col = c("black", "red"), lty = c(1,2))


```
